name: INCreateNoteIntent
desc: A request to create a new note.

items.name: init(title: INSpeakableString?, content: INNoteContent?, groupName: INSpeakableString?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified note content.

items.name: var title: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The title text for the note.

items.name: var content: INNoteContent?
items.desc: The main content of the note.

items.name: var groupName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The group that contains the note.
